wikipedia_page.main: Gregory Gerald Cork (born 29 September 1994) is an English cricketer who played for Derbyshire. The son of former Derbyshire and England all-rounder Dominic Cork, Cork is a right-handed batsman who bowls left-arm medium-fast. He left Derbyshire upon the expiry of his contract at the end of the 2017 season. He is now the overseas player at Surrey Hills Cricket Club in Melbourne.
